biotools.summary: Cancer in silico Drug Discovery (CIDD) is a platform to integrate data from the TCGA, Connectivity Map (CMap) and Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia to facilitate and automate discovery of candidate drug compounds with the ultimate goal for treatment or chemo-prevention of cancer.

bioschemas.name: CiDD
bioschemas.summary: Cancer in silico Drug Discovery (CIDD) is a platform to integrate data from the TCGA, Connectivity Map (CMap) and Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia to facilitate and automate discovery of candidate drug compounds with the ultimate goal for treatment or chemo-prevention of cancer.
